$interpreted: : Two years later...
Panther Chieftain: Calm down, everyone. Listen here. The Alliance is in trouble, and we hope you'll be able to help us.
Baa Baa: Huh?
Panther Chieftain: We've seen a raft of natural disasters this year, and the crops have failed at Cloud Manor.

Panther Chieftain: We here in the East may be blessed with rich and fertile natural resources, but this situation will be unsustainable. We're projecting that this region will soon be facing dire famine.
Troubled Beast: But what about the granaries and the emergency provisions? Now's the time to open them up.
Panther Chieftain: Ah, that's true, but there's only so much good they can do. Capacity is limited, and there won't be enough for everyone.
Panther Chieftain: If not for that, the Alliance wouldn't have to put everyone on the alert.
Panther Chieftain: We're now opening a call for suppliers. All interested parties are welcome to apply.
Baa Baa: Here it is~ I hear the sound of money calling~~~
Baa Baa: I'm back~
Yang-Tai: Welcome, take a rest.
Baa Baa: Listen, I just heard something wonderful~
Baa Baa: It's a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity!
Baa Baa: If we pull this off we'll be rolling in dough, and our society's reputation will be sweet as!
Yang-Tai: I understand, but this is the Alliance we're talking about. If anything goes wrong, at best we'll be fined, and at worst, we'll jeopardize the entire Kai-Tai Group.
Baa Baa: But like you always say, no risk, no reward, right~? And... and...
Yang-Tai: What is it?
Baa Baa: I heard... Sennosuke's got his eye on this deal too.
Yang-Tai: ...Yes, he wouldn't let an opportunity like this go to waste...
Baa Baa: We've got to do what we can to help those in need, right?
Baa Baa: It's our responsibility to get our goods into our customers' hands, isn't it?
Baa Baa: What are you smiling for?
Yang-Tai: I'm just feeling proud...
Baa Baa: Huh?
Yang-Tai: You're right. We have to help people in need. We have to do what's right. Come on, let's call everyone to discuss it.
Yang-Tai: ...So that's the situation. Everyone here is a member of our group, so please, speak any concerns freely and fully.
Demihuman Member: It does sound like a great bargain...
Papa Gu: Not to be a spoilsport, President Yang, but while this sounds like a safe bet, there are hidden dangers too.
Papa Gu: The provisions required to feed just one region alone must be huge. Ensuring a reliable supply will be crucial.
Yang-Tai: Yes, that's the tricky part. But not to worry, I have a plan.
Papa Gu: What plan?
Yang-Tai: I have a friend who's been working in agriculture for donkey's years. With him as our source, we won't have any issues with supply whatsoever.
Papa Gu: ...Won't that be risky? What if something goes wrong?
Yang-Tai: He's diligent, pragmatic, and dependable. He got his start by saving money all by himself, and I've worked for him for many years. He gets things done with unquestionable speed and quality.
Papa Gu: All right. We all trust you on this, if you say so.
Yang-Tai: Thank you, everyone. We won't let you down.
Yang-Tai: What's wrong? That's a harsh frown you've got on.
Baa Baa: ...I'm just wondering... Am I causing you a lot of trouble? Doesn't seem like everyone was totally on board with this plan.
Yang-Tai: Don't be silly. There'll always be different opinions, but the important thing is that we all communicate and reach a compromise.
Baa Baa: I see! So will ya let me go ahead and close the deal? I did come up with the idea, after all, and I feel bad not lending a hand.
Yang-Tai: Hmm... Actually, that would be wonderful. I've some more merchants I have to be paying a visit to, and I can't be in two places at once.
Yang-Tai: He lives here. Here's the deposit. Remember, always be careful.
Baa Baa: Okay~
Baa Baa: So this is the place?
Baa Baa: Hellooo~ Anybody here~? I'm here on behalf of the Kai-Tai Group~
Baa Baa: I'm not disturbing you, am I? I'm sorry, I didn't mean to...
Baa Baa: I said I didn't mean to! Don't yap at me!
Yang-Tai's Friend: Sit!
Baa Baa: Phew... Almost lost me mutton chops there.
Yang-Tai's Friend: I'm sorry, he's just afraid of strangers. Don't you mind him.
Baa Baa: That's alright~ I'm still in one piece~
Baa Baa: You must be our President's friend? G'dday to ya~ The President's sent me to talk business with you...
Yang-Tai's Friend: I see. You can leave it to me, I'll get you the toppest-notchest goods I can.
Baa Baa: Wonderful, I knew we could count on you~
Yang-Tai's Friend: Ha, Yang-Tai's lucky to have a good kid like you around.
Baa Baa: Thanks~ But I did have one more thing I'd like your help with.
Yang-Tai's Friend: A-a-are you crazy?!
Baa Baa: Huh? Like I told ya, it's just a small favor.
Yang-Tai's Friend: You're insane! I'd never do such a thing!
Baa Baa: You're making this tricky for me...
Baa Baa: Six years ago, when Alliance officials were moving a convoy of cash through Thousand Colors Lake, they were set upon and murdered by thieves. The murderers have never been identified.
Baa Baa: The strange thing is, not long after that, you showed up with a bundle of savings and set up your agricultural business.
Yang-Tai's Friend: I... I don't know what you're implying, that's just a coincidence...
Baa Baa: Okay. Take a look here.
Yang-Tai's Friend: Th-th-this is...
Baa Baa: It's all here, right? This statement was made by your accomplice in the robbery.
Baa Baa: I bet the Alliance would be fascinated by all this. But I'm sure we can work something out between us~
Yang-Tai's Friend: You... Where did you get this...? It's not possible...
Baa Baa: So, whadd'ya say? Wanna help a sheep out?
Yang-Tai's Friend: I... But what if I'm found out? I'll be finished, just the same...
Baa Baa: Don't worry. Business is all about helping each other out. Someone'll be there to take you to a safe place and give you a new identity.
Baa Baa: Now, back to our business—Do we have a deal?

Model.Text: Two years later...
Calm down, everyone. Listen here. The Alliance is in trouble, and we hope you'll be able to help us.
Huh?
We've seen a raft of natural disasters this year, and the crops have failed at Cloud Manor.
We here in the East may be blessed with rich and fertile natural resources, but this situation will be unsustainable. We're projecting that this region will soon be facing dire famine.
But what about the granaries and the emergency provisions? Now's the time to open them up.
Ah, that's true, but there's only so much good they can do. Capacity is limited, and there won't be enough for everyone.
If not for that, the Alliance wouldn't have to put everyone on the alert.
We're now opening a call for suppliers. All interested parties are welcome to apply.
Here it is~ I hear the sound of money calling~~~
I'm back~
Welcome, take a rest.
Listen, I just heard something wonderful~
It's a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity!
If we pull this off we'll be rolling in dough, and our society's reputation will be sweet as!
I understand, but this is the Alliance we're talking about. If anything goes wrong, at best we'll be fined, and at worst, we'll jeopardize the entire Kai-Tai Group.
But like you always say, no risk, no reward, right~? And... and...
What is it?
I heard... Sennosuke's got his eye on this deal too.
...Yes, he wouldn't let an opportunity like this go to waste...
We've got to do what we can to help those in need, right?
It's our responsibility to get our goods into our customers' hands, isn't it?
What are you smiling for?
I'm just feeling proud...
Huh?
You're right. We have to help people in need. We have to do what's right. Come on, let's call everyone to discuss it.
...So that's the situation. Everyone here is a member of our group, so please, speak any concerns freely and fully.
It does sound like a great bargain...
Not to be a spoilsport, President Yang, but while this sounds like a safe bet, there are hidden dangers too.
The provisions required to feed just one region alone must be huge. Ensuring a reliable supply will be crucial.
Yes, that's the tricky part. But not to worry, I have a plan.
What plan?
I have a friend who's been working in agriculture for donkey's years. With him as our source, we won't have any issues with supply whatsoever.
...Won't that be risky? What if something goes wrong?
He's diligent, pragmatic, and dependable. He got his start by saving money all by himself, and I've worked for him for many years. He gets things done with unquestionable speed and quality.
All right. We all trust you on this, if you say so.
Thank you, everyone. We won't let you down.
What's wrong? That's a harsh frown you've got on.
...I'm just wondering... Am I causing you a lot of trouble? Doesn't seem like everyone was totally on board with this plan.
Don't be silly. There'll always be different opinions, but the important thing is that we all communicate and reach a compromise.
I see! So will ya let me go ahead and close the deal? I did come up with the idea, after all, and I feel bad not lending a hand.
Hmm... Actually, that would be wonderful. I've some more merchants I have to be paying a visit to, and I can't be in two places at once.
He lives here. Here's the deposit. Remember, always be careful.
Okay~
So this is the place?
Hellooo~ Anybody here~? I'm here on behalf of the Kai-Tai Group~
I'm not disturbing you, am I? I'm sorry, I didn't mean to...
I said I didn't mean to! Don't yap at me!
Sit!
Phew... Almost lost me mutton chops there.
I'm sorry, he's just afraid of strangers. Don't you mind him.
That's alright~ I'm still in one piece~
You must be our President's friend? G'dday to ya~ The President's sent me to talk business with you...
I see. You can leave it to me, I'll get you the toppest-notchest goods I can.
Wonderful, I knew we could count on you~
Ha, Yang-Tai's lucky to have a good kid like you around.
Thanks~ But I did have one more thing I'd like your help with.
A-a-are you crazy?!
Huh? Like I told ya, it's just a small favor.
You're insane! I'd never do such a thing!
You're making this tricky for me...
Six years ago, when Alliance officials were moving a convoy of cash through Thousand Colors Lake, they were set upon and murdered by thieves. The murderers have never been identified.
The strange thing is, not long after that, you showed up with a bundle of savings and set up your agricultural business.
I... I don't know what you're implying, that's just a coincidence...
Okay. Take a look here.
Th-th-this is...
It's all here, right? This statement was made by your accomplice in the robbery.
I bet the Alliance would be fascinated by all this. But I'm sure we can work something out between us~
You... Where did you get this...? It's not possible...
So, whadd'ya say? Wanna help a sheep out?
I... But what if I'm found out? I'll be finished, just the same...
Don't worry. Business is all about helping each other out. Someone'll be there to take you to a safe place and give you a new identity.
Now, back to our business—Do we have a deal?

Don't you mind him.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0186_003_dialog_english##_16_002","SpeakerName":"Baa Baa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0186","IconName":"h0186s3_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"That's alright~ I'm still in one piece~","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0186_003_dialog_english##_16_003","SpeakerName":"Baa Baa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0186","IconName":"h0186s3_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"You must be our President's friend? G'dday to ya~ The President's sent me to talk business with you...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0186_003_dialog_english##_17_000","SpeakerName":"Yang-Tai's Friend","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3442c3","IconName":"t3442c3_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I see. You can leave it to me, I'll get you the toppest-notchest goods I can.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0186_003_dialog_english##_17_001","SpeakerName":"Baa Baa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0186","IconName":"h0186s3_delight","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Wonderful, I knew we could count on you~","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0186_003_dialog_english##_17_002","SpeakerName":"Yang-Tai's Friend","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3442c3","IconName":"t3442c3_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Ha, Yang-Tai's lucky to have a good kid like you around.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0186_003_dialog_english##_17_003","SpeakerName":"Baa Baa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0186","IconName":"h0186s3_delight","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Thanks~ But I did have one more thing I'd like your help with.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0186_003_dialog_english##_18_000","SpeakerName":"Yang-Tai's Friend","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3442c3","IconName":"t3442c3_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"A-a-are you crazy?!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0186_003_dialog_english##_18_001","SpeakerName":"Baa Baa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0186","IconName":"h0186s3_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Huh? Like I told ya, it's just a small favor.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0186_003_dialog_english##_18_002","SpeakerName":"Yang-Tai's Friend","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3442c3","IconName":"t3442c3_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"You're insane! I'd never do such a thing!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0186_003_dialog_english##_18_003","SpeakerName":"Baa Baa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0186","IconName":"h0186s3_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"You're making this tricky for me...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0186_003_dialog_english##_19_000","SpeakerName":"Baa Baa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0186","IconName":"h0186s3_delight","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Six years ago, when Alliance officials were moving a convoy of cash through Thousand Colors Lake, they were set upon and murdered by thieves. The murderers have never been identified.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0186_003_dialog_english##_20_000","SpeakerName":"Baa Baa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0186","IconName":"h0186s3_delight","IconLocate":2,"Text":"The strange thing is, not long after that, you showed up with a bundle of savings and set up your agricultural business.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0186_003_dialog_english##_20_001","SpeakerName":"Yang-Tai's Friend","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3442c3","IconName":"t3442c3_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I... I don't know what you're implying, that's just a coincidence...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0186_003_dialog_english##_20_002","SpeakerName":"Baa Baa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0186","IconName":"h0186s3_delight","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Okay. Take a look here.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0186_003_dialog_english##_21_000","SpeakerName":"Yang-Tai's Friend","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3442c3","IconName":"t3442c3_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Th-th-this is...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0186_003_dialog_english##_21_001","SpeakerName":"Baa Baa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0186","IconName":"h0186s3_sp2","IconLocate":2,"Text":"It's all here, right? This statement was made by your accomplice in the robbery.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0186_003_dialog_english##_21_002","SpeakerName":"Baa Baa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0186","IconName":"h0186s3_sp1","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I bet the Alliance would be fascinated by all this. But I'm sure we can work something out between us~","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0186_003_dialog_english##_22_000","SpeakerName":"Yang-Tai's Friend","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3442c3","IconName":"t3442c3_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"You... Where did you get this...? It's not possible...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0186_003_dialog_english##_22_001","SpeakerName":"Baa Baa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0186","IconName":"h0186s3_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"So, whadd'ya say? Wanna help a sheep out?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0186_003_dialog_english##_22_002","SpeakerName":"Yang-Tai's Friend","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3442c3","IconName":"t3442c3_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I... But what if I'm found out? I'll be finished, just the same...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0186_003_dialog_english##_22_003","SpeakerName":"Baa Baa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0186","IconName":"h0186s3_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Don't worry. Business is all about helping each other out. Someone'll be there to take you to a safe place and give you a new identity.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0186_003_dialog_english##_22_004","SpeakerName":"Baa Baa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0186","IconName":"h0186s3_sp2","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Now, back to our business\u2014Do we have a deal?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0}]}
